page.title: 19NEWSPAPERS
page.content: A number of local papers cover the area: { Slough Express 15p { Windsor and Eton Express,cost 15p. I think one of its best points is that it has little sections for each village.It has a sports page,local advertising and what's on in the area. {Slough Observer,cost 15p {Windsor and Eton Observer 15p It is all about what's happening in Slough,especially local clubs and fetes .This is the most popular paper in our class. The Mid-week Observer,Mid-week Express, Property News , the Herald, the Leader and the Informer are all free newspapers.They tell you a lot about local shops,services and entertainments.
